overview:
Victor Olteanu is a technology entrepreneur and software architect.

Involved with the web since the early days, Victor has built solutions for a large number of clients, from start-ups to Fortune 100 corporations.

He is currently consultant and owner at New York City-based Innergy Software Inc.

In 2006 he led the development of several SaaS projects as a technical lead for Medidata Solutions Worldwide.

In 2008 he was technical lead for the online recruiting start-up eHire.

He consulted and worked for RecycleBank, Kaleidoscope, Wireless Generation, Nature Publishing Group and Time Inc.

At present he is focuses on emerging technology initiatives in the web and mobile arena, using primarily HTML5 / JavaScript / Sencha Touch / ExtJS / Ruby on Rails.
